Tucked in the corner of a more so normal/local Ramblas, is La Tertulia.  The service here is pretty good and they have english menus.  Notice you will likely be one of the few tourists on the outside and all the locals are inside where the prices are cheaper and where you can watch the football match.  Tapas are pretty tasty too.  Try the Eggplant fried with goat cheese or the lamb kabob.  Mmmm.
